page.title: 04GARAGES OF WILLAND
page.content: {SPEARINGS GARAGES}WERE BUILT IN 1924 AND 1932. THE ONE NEXT TO THE SCHOOL WAS RUN BY A MAN CALLED MR PRIZEMAN (FROM 1932 TO 1946). THEN A MAN CALLED MR SPEARING TOOK IT OVER AND STILL RUNS IT. THEY SELL{PETROL AT } {Â£2.05 A GALLON}AND SERVICE CARS. THE SECOND SPEARING GARAGE IS ON THE ROAD OUT OF THE VILLAGE TO THE NORTH. IN 1924 IT WAS ONLY A HUT AND A PUMP. IT HAS BEEN CHANGED THREE TIMES THE MOST RECENT BEING THIS SUMMER. A CANOPY HAS BEEN BUILT OVER THE FORECOURT AND THE SHOP WITH THE GARAGE HAS EXPANDED TO SELL A WIDE RANGE OF GOODS.( E.G. POT PLANTS, FOOD) THIS GARAGE DOES NOT FIX CARS.{ GOFFS GARAGE }ON THE CULLOMPTON ROAD INTO WILLAND WAS BUILT BY LLOYD MAUDERS AS A GUEST HOUSE IN 1929. THEN ESSO BOUGHT IT AND CHANGED IT INTO A FILLING STATION. IT ALSO HAS A SHOP SELLING A WIDE VARIETY OF GOODS.
